unnormalised: Borem, konn konn Linear Algebra vixim vicharta. Tankam toyar ravonk sang, hem fokot X ani Y viximuch nhoi! Tem space bodolpak asa... maths-an! Oxem chint: tum Delhi-nt eka lognak asat, ani 15 xirddaram (Uncle Sharma front-an ravonk *agrah* kortat) mandunk sodtat, ani tumka boskechi yevzonn korunk zai konnakuch laddu vixim zhogddo zaunk favo nhoi mhonn. Tem linear algebra, punn ruchik. Tem vectorank lagna soiream sarkim bori ritin manddunk modot korta!
normalised: Bore, koni linear algebra vixim vicharta. Toyar ravat, hem fokot X ani Y vixim na! Tem jagachi rupantor korpache asa... mathan! Oxem chintat: tum Delhi-ant eka lognak asa, pondra soireanchem ayojan korpak sodhta (kak Sharma mukhar ravpak agrah dorta), ani tumka boskichi yeujonn tharavpak zai zannen konn laddunchea karnnak zognim korchonat. Tem linear algebra, punn ruchikar. Tem laginachea soirean sarkean vectoranchem ayojan kortalem!

unnormalised: Gombhirponnan sangta, Linear Algebra soglleakuch vaporta. Google-chea PageRank algorithm-antlean (zo website poile tumkam tras ditolo tem tharaita), image processing-ak (tumchi Instagram selfie *thoddi* tori komi vaitt dista), sogllem Linear Algebra bhitorlean asa. Polle, Matrix A Vector B-an guntun asaâ€¦ani boom! Tumcho manzar video 0.5 second-an load zata 5 second-anchea bodlek. IIT-chea mhojea professoran sangtalem, "Tem soglleach cool vostuncho buniyad," ani to chukicho naslo.
normalised: Gambhir zaun, linear algebra sogllekodden vapratat. Google-che PageRank algorithm (zannen tharaita kosli website tumka poilem tras ditli), image processing-ak (tumchi Instagram selfies thodi kam dreadful distali), hem sogllem linear algebra-nchea adharan asa. Deka, Matrix A Vector B kodden gunnlem jata... ani boom! Tumcho manjer video panch sekundam bodlek shunya point panch sekundam-an load zata. Mhojea I-I-T professoran sangtalo, "Tem sogllea shantichea vostuncho adhar asa," ani to chukonantalo.

unnormalised: Eka matrix-achi kalpna eka hell-antlea spreadsheet sarki kara. Borem, kaimn tori *hell* nhoi, punn kiteak tori eka spreadsheet-achi yevzonn eka zannem keli ji chai break-achea bodlek abstract kalpnak zaitich ruch dita. Tumchea kodde rows, columns ani numbers asat... chodd numbers. He numbers transformations dakhoitat. Udharonnak, tumka ek image 90 degrees-an ghovoitaunk zai asonk xakta (kiteak nhoi?). Ek matrix tem korunk xakta! Vo tumka 3x + 2y = 7 ani x - y = 1 ekach vellar solve korunk zai asonk xakta. Linear algebra tumchea sangatak asa, bhai!
normalised: Matrix-achem chintan narka sarke spreadsheet vaprun korat. Bore, kadachit narkh nasta, punn kesin tori spreadsheet zannem abstracto konceptanchi ruch ghheta, chaiechea break-am poros. Tumka row, column, ani number asat... khupe number. He number rupantorachem pratinidhitv kortat. Udahornnak, kadachit tum eka image-ak navvad digree-an phiravnk sodhta (kiden na?). Matrix tem korunk shaktta! Vo kadachit tum tin x plus don y barabar saat ani x minus y barabar ek sathak gunnunk sodhta. Linear algebra tumchea sangatak asa, bhai!

unnormalised: Tech pasun, Linear Algebra kathinn asa? Borem, ami fokot sangum-ia tanka eka vegllench torechea budhiponneachi goroz asa â€“ jeo abstract kalpnacho zhogddo korunk xakta ani matrix multiplication kortana kitle bore toren 1 kaddun vhellat tem eka vellar sambhallonk xakta. Bori khobor mhonllear, ek fautim tumchi zonn zali mhunnttlear, tum Diwali partik casually eigenvalues vishim uloun tumchea ixttank impress korunk xaktat! Ani, tum zannat, Uncle Sharma-k boskechi mandavnuk samzonkui modot korunk xaktat. Fokot tori. ðŸ˜‰
normalised: Tor, linear algebra kathinn asa? Bore, fakt sangonk dhyat tumka veglleo buddhinchi goroz asa â€“ zaum te abstracto vicharancho jugaling kortat ani matrix-achem gunnunkarta astana tumchea sangatan eka-ekank mellunk zai. Bori khobor mhanje, tumka zamngele mhanje, tumchea sangatak Diwali partiek eigenvaue-nchea vixim uloun impress korunk shakhtat! Ani, tum zanna, kadachit kak Sharma-k boskechi yeujonn samzonk madat korunk shakhtat. Kadachit. wink
